          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sample Lesson</string>
            <string language="es">Lección de muestra</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht Samplach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispiellektion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon D'Échantillon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição Da Amostra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione Del Campione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα δειγμάτων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a lesson based on the house and things concerned with the house.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta es una lección basada en la casa y las cosas relacionadas con la casa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá anseo ceacht atá bunaithe ar an teach agus ar nithe a bhaineann leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plean Ceachta</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Lesson Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Lektion, die auf dem Haus und den 
Sachen betroffen werden mit dem Haus basiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une leçon basée sur la maison et les 
choses concernées par la maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma lição baseada na casa e nas coisas 
concernidas com a casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una lezione basata sulla casa e sulle cose
interessate della casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα μάθημα βασισμένο στο σπίτι και τα 
πράγματα ενδιαφερόμενα για το σπίτι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
